message.body: We are in Connecticut, land of your misery
Get a lobster roll. I swear it's the only thing I miss
#### has already told me to stop doing various things half a dozen times, so this should be a fun trip
Haha
There is a place that makes them in boston and they aren't as good as the place you took us to, and they're 30 fucking dollars
There is a food cart at ###### that does CT style ones a few times every summer. $12 with fries. They are amazing
Oh my god
Anyway, safe travels. You may hit some storms in NY or Jersey, so be careful. Send me a text when you're almost out of Jersey!
There is only one truck in boston that does lobster rolls and they are not hot ones, but they are great
You got it, dude!

Heads up - the storm that's hitting Philly now is flat out scary. It's blowing east quickly but take a look at the radar where you are. I would try to find a rest stop before it hits you and wait it out. Visibility on the turnpike is going to be awful
Thanks for the headsup, we just got a flood warning
We are gassing up, peeing and then assessing the situation
We just got into jersey
This may be the last things we ever see
Jesus. Can you pull over until it blows through? They're narrow storm bands
The traffic is very slow
OK. That's probably good in this case
I'm a little afraid to ask how it's going
Almost there, 40 minutes
There was bad traffique
I figured the traffic would be horrific. No rush, just making sure you're OK :)
Me so hungry
I was going to say, I assume you guys are going to want food the second you get here. Do you want me to order something?
I think we are okay to wait to go out, not dying yet
OK!
Thanks though
Camden!!!
The only time in history anyone has been excited to be in Camden
Haha
There is a parking spot out front. I can't believe it. I hope you get it.
